languages.text: "Глейто..." {n}Соломон пытается не то дотянуться до кибермастифа, не то жестом отдать ему приказ, но пес лежит, не реагируя на происходящее.{/n}
"Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Глейто..." {n}Соломон пытается не то дотянуться до кибермастифа, не то жестом отдать ему приказ, но пес лежит, не реагируя на происходящее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or give him a command with a gesture, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}
"Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or give him a command with a gesture, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}
"Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}
"Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}
"Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}
"Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}

languages.text: “格雷托……”{n}索罗蒙伸出了手，像是要抚摸他的生化獒犬，又像是在通过手势发出命令，但格雷托却一动不动地躺着，没有任何反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “格雷托……”{n}索罗蒙伸出了手，像是要抚摸他的生化獒犬，又像是在通过手势发出命令，但格雷托却一动不动地躺着，没有任何反应。{/n}

languages.text: «Glaito...». {n}Solomorne está intentando llegar hasta su cibermastín, o posiblemente darle una orden, pero el perro permanece inmóvil y no responde.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Glaito...». {n}Solomorne está intentando llegar hasta su cibermastín, o posiblemente darle una orden, pero el perro permanece inmóvil y no responde.{/n}

languages.text: « Glaito... » {n}Solomorne tente de donner un ordre au cyber-mastiff, puis de le toucher, mais le chien étendu ne frémit même pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Glaito... » {n}Solomorne tente de donner un ordre au cyber-mastiff, puis de le toucher, mais le chien étendu ne frémit même pas.{/n}

languages.text: 「グライト…」{n}ソロモーンはサイバーマスチフに手を差し伸べようとしたり、命令のジェスチャーをしようとしているが、犬はじっと横たわり、まったく反応がなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「グライト…」{n}ソロモーンはサイバーマスチフに手を差し伸べようとしたり、命令のジェスチャーをしようとしているが、犬はじっと横たわり、まったく反応がなかった。{/n}

languages.text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne ya siber mastife uzanmaya ya da ona bir komut vermeye çalışıyor ama köpek hareketsiz, tamamen tepkisiz bir şekilde yatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne ya siber mastife uzanmaya ya da ona bir komut vermeye çalışıyor ama köpek hareketsiz, tamamen tepkisiz bir şekilde yatıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Glaito ..." {n}Solomorne will entweder nach dem Cyber-Mastiff greifen oder ihm einen Befehl gestikulieren, aber der Hund liegt bewegungslos da und reagiert überhaupt nicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glaito..." {n}Solomorne is either trying to reach out to the cyber-mastiff or gesture a command to him, but the dog is lying still, completely unresponsive.{/n}
